author: Paul Cullen, Pat Leahy
title: Coronavirus: Travel beyond 2km permitted for food shopping
description: Taoiseach and Minister for Health to speak with medical leaders today
content:
The Government has moved to clarify that people can travel beyond 2km of their homes to buy food.
A spokesman stressed that there was no need to panic buy or stockpile groceries and other supplies.
Members of the public are advised that, under the new restr… [+5617 chars]
